alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 4:40PM PST until March 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of one to two inches in the communities of Frazier Park, Pine Mountain Club, and Cuddy Valley. Snowfall of one to two inches along Interstate 5 over Tejon Pass. Additional snow accumulations of one to two inches along Highway 58 over Tehachapi Pass. Winds will gusts as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The lower Sierra Nevada, the Tehachapi Mountains and the San Emigdio Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
